Package com.visionspace.taskmanager

Class LocalTaskManagerTest

java.lang.Object
com.visionspace.taskmanager.TaskManagerTest
com.visionspace.taskmanager.LocalTaskManagerTest
public class LocalTaskManagerTest
extends TaskManagerTest
Unit tests for the TaskManager implementation of the TaskManager interface that is returned by the TaskManagerFactory. Actual tests are implemented in the base class.
